Posts.Content: Jan 10, 2012 02:32PM lemondrop1967 wrote: You are beautiful - thank you for sharing these pictures!  I am only about 2 months out from diagnosis (had BMX on 12/15 and will be starting chemo in 1-2 weeks, followed by rads, then reconstruction) and it's so great to see and hear that there is a light at the end of the tunnel.
Posts.Title: What a difference a year makes jennyboog Yndorian
